channel.title: Help please!

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

Ok So i want to add pets, I already have summoning and in my summoning file theres this

case 1119: //changed req = 99; useWith = pouch; charm = crim; item = itemUsed; amountofshard = 178; if(hasitem()) { c.getItems().addItem(12790, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(5800, 22); //AmtExp is different so its defined in the method } break;

How do i edit this so people can spawn baby dragons? I know the npc id for the dragons i just want to know what i should edit.

Read full topic
